text:
I may have to find a part-time job after this whole mess. I wanted to work at a restaurant, but I feel like the tips would be low because people would still be a little reluctant to eat out. Ideally I would like to make $200-400 for about 16-20 hours a week as side income.

any advice and thoughts would be greatly appreciated!
title: After businesses open, where do you guys think are some decent and safe part-time jobs?
